verses.name: 1 Corinthians 3:14
verses.text: If any man’s work abide which he hath built thereupon, he shall receive a reward.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 3:15
verses.text: If any man’s work shall be burned, he shall suffer loss: but he himself shall be saved; yet so as by fire.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 3:16
verses.text: Know ye not that ye are the temple of God, and that the Spirit of God dwelleth in you?

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 3:17
verses.text: If any man defile the temple of God, him shall God destroy; for the temple of God is holy, which temple ye are.
